      • createBanner

        public static java.lang.String createBanner(java.lang.String text)
        create banner with
        calls createBanner(String, int, char, int, int)
        as createBanner(String str, length = 50, symbol = '#', textColor = FOREGROUND_YELLOW, symbolColor = = FOREGROUND_BLUE)
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:

                                            int textColor,
                                            int symbolColor)

                                                     int length,

      • createUnColoredBanner

        public static java.lang.String createUnColoredBanner(java.lang.String text)
        length = 50, symbol = '#'
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:

      • createBanner

        public static java.lang.String createBanner(java.lang.String text,
                                            int length,
                                            char symbol,
                                            int textColor,
                                            int symbolColor)
        Parameters:
        text - should be single line
        length - string length of single line
        symbol - char used to wrap the string
        textColor - FOREGROUND_{color} color to wrap the text (if u wish skip ansi coloring then pass this value -1)
        symbolColor - FOREGROUND_{color} color to wrap the symbol (if u wish skip ansi coloring then pass this value -1)
        Returns:
